results.title: Metformin-treated-GDM has lower risk of macrosomia compared to diet-treated GDM- a retrospective cohort study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-treated-GDM has lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ compared to diet-treated GDM- a retrospective cohort study.

results.text_hl: Tenth, we were unable to perform transitivity analysis for @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ due to lack of studies on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin for pregnancy and beyond: the pros and cons.
results.text_hl: Despite its increasing use, controversy remains surrounding its benefits and risks. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ effectively reduces hyperglycaemia for the mother during pregnancy and it reduces rates of @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ and @DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@neonatal hypoglycaemia@@@.

results.title: A Review on the Use of Metformin in Pregnancy and Its Associated Fetal Outcomes
results.text_hl: Short-term follow-up of pregnancies that used @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy revealed that there was not any higher chance of @DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@pre-eclampsia@@@, @DISEASE_Obstetric_Labor_Premature @DISEASE_MESH:D007752 @@@premature labor@@@, neonatal intensive care unit admissions, @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ or @DISEASE_Goldenhar_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D006053 @@@microsomia@@@, and morbidity or mortality of the child up to the first year of life.

results.title: Metformin in gestational diabetes: physiological actions and clinical applications.
results.text_hl: On the basis of current evidence, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces gestational @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@, @DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@neonatal hypoglycaemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ and increases @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity.

citations.NLM: Mason T, Alesi S, Fernando M, Vanky E, Teede HJ, Mousa A. Metformin in gestational diabetes: physiological actions and clinical applications. Nat Rev Endocrinol. 2024 Oct 25;():. PMID: 39455749

results.title: Metformin in Pregnancy for Women with Type 2 Diabetes: a Review.
results.text_hl: RECENT FINDINGS: A large, multicenter, double-blind randomized controlled trial found that @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ in pregnancy treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as an adjunct to @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ therapy had less gestational @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@, @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ requirements, caesarian sections, @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@, and neonatal @DISEASE_Neoplasms_Adipose_Tissue @DISEASE_MESH:D018205 @@@adiposity@@@, but more neonates were @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@small for gestational age@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@SGA@@@) compared with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ alone.

results.title: Metformin-associated maternal and neonatal outcomes in women with gestational diabetes - a retrospective cohort study.
results.text_hl: The lowest incidence of newborns with @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@neonatal hypoglycemia@@@ has been observed in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ cohort.

results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ significantly reduces fetal weight in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@GDM@@@, theoretically preventing @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@.

results.title: Metformin versus insulin for gestational diabetes: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Among these, seventeen RCTs (N = 2828 participants) were included for quantitative analyses and seven studies were included only for qualitative synthesis. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ lowered the risk of pregnancy-induced @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ (p = .03; risk ratio (RR) = 0.64; confidence interval (95%CI) [0.44, 0.95]), large for gestational age babies (p = .04; RR = 0.82; 95% CI [0.68, 0.99]), @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ (p = .01; RR = 0.63; 95%CI [0.45, 0.90]), neonatal @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@ (p = .001; RR = 0.72; 95%CI [0.59, 0.88]), and neonatal intensive care unit admission (p = .01; RR = 0.74; 95%CI [0.58, 0.94]).

citations.NLM: Bao LX, Shi WT, Han YX. Metformin versus insulin for gestational diabetes: a systematic review and meta-analysis. J Matern Fetal Neonatal Med. 2021 Aug;34(16):2741-2753. PMID: 31558075
